content:
You’ve been effortlessly removed from my email list.
If you’re curious about how I built the API you just experienced, I wrote about it in this post about Simple Subscribe!
title: Unsubscribed

content:
Hello! You've receiving this because someone (hopefully you) requested a subscription to my list.

To complete your subscription, please let me know how you found me! Any of these links will finish signing you up.

If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it as this email has not (yet!) been added to my list.
